cards.title: All planets and asteroids have the same name
cards.description:
WTH !? I'm pretty sure I'm not doing it wrong :-/

No they don't, I was printing the name of the last iteration instead of the current one... DUH!

cards.title: Body class
cards.description:
star, name, system_x, system_y, color, symbol

For stars, planets, stations, asteroids, comets...

coordinates are centered around the star

cards.title: Elder Guardian
cards.description:
Like in the roach motel

There are sentinels too, they are actively hunting down ships who use elder weapons

cards.title: Support arrow keys
cards.description:
Arrow up is 27 + 91 + 65 in Linux
            27 + 224 + 0 in Windows (not sure last)

So it's not too hard, if 27 call getch again etc.

But 27 is the ESC key so if you press ESC you get stuck with the second getch :-(

The real solution seems to be rewrite for curses but I don't want to at all now.

DEFERRED
